This works for WordPress:

``` ruby
module WordPress
  def self.table_name_prefix
    'wp_'
  end
end

class WordPress::Post < ActiveRecord::Base
  self.inheritance_column = 'post_type'

  class << self
    def find_sti_class(type_name)
      parent.const_get(type_name.camelize)
    end

    def sti_name
      name.demodulize.underscore
    end
  end
end

class WordPress::Page < WordPress::Post; end
```

``` irb
>> WordPress::Page.first
  WordPress::Page Load (0.5ms)  SELECT `wp_posts`.* FROM `wp_posts` WHERE `wp_posts`.`post_type` IN ('page') LIMIT 1
```

The rest is left as an exercise for the reader :smile:
